result.title: Exposure assessment framework
result.description: Exposure assessment framework. The validated guidance on the use of the individual models, methods and protocols developed within each of the technical WPs will be drawn together into the Exposure Assessment Framework and made freely available as an online catalogue (The “NanoFASE model catalogue”) with the appropriate documentation required (ideally supported by published papers) to enable stakeholders to use and incorporate nano-specific processes into existing exposure and risk assessment models
